rules.name: gap_inside
rules.title: Gap (inside)
rules.description: Gap? Is there anyone in my Gap (inside, closest to the ball)?

rules.name: on_me
rules.title: On me
rules.description: On me? Is there anyone On me (right across from me)?

rules.name: gap_outside
rules.title: Outside
rules.description: Outside me? Is there anyone in my Outside Gap (away from the ball)?

rules.name: destroy_nearest
rules.title: Destroy (Playside)
rules.description: Destroy Playside: Is there anyone Down the playside? (the 'left' part of this call)
